response.original_title: Can you reverse a transaction on kraken {{RECOVERY}}
response.overview: You generally +1║307║256║8902 cannot reverse a transaction on Kraken once it has been processed, especially if it involves cryptocurrency. The fundamental +1║307║256║8902 nature of cryptocurrency transactions, once confirmed on the blockchain, means they are permanent and irreversible by Kraken or any other party. This is +1║307║256║8902 why Kraken stresses the need to double-check the wallet address, network, and amount before hitting "Confirm." However, you +1║307║256║8902 can cancel an unconfirmed withdrawal (fiat or crypto) if the status is still marked as Initiating or Pending in your funding history. Once +1║307║256║8902 a cryptocurrency withdrawal status changes to Sending or Success (broadcast to the blockchain), it cannot be stopped or recovered.
